payload.content: Many businesses that were enviable three years ago (e.g., $100M+ revenue, solid customer base, mature executives, good team) are now effectively "walking dead" due to their inability to adapt to AI.

name: Many businesses that were enviable three years ago (e.g., $100M+ revenue, solid
content: Many businesses that were enviable three years ago (e.g., $100M+ revenue, solid customer base, mature executives, good team) are now effectively "walking dead" due to their inability to adapt to AI.

payload.content: Existing companies often mistakenly believe their competition remains the same, leading them to maintain outdated strategies and processes, while new entrants leverage AI to build products faster and more efficiently.

name: Existing companies often mistakenly believe their competition remains the same,
content: Existing companies often mistakenly believe their competition remains the same, leading them to maintain outdated strategies and processes, while new entrants leverage AI to build products faster and more efficiently.

payload.content: To adopt new tools, organizations should address resistance from legal, security, and finance departments.

name: To adopt new tools, organizations should address resistance from legal, security
content: To adopt new tools, organizations should address resistance from legal, security, and finance departments.

payload.content: Empower top engineers to optimize the code repository for agent-friendly operations.

name: Empower top engineers to optimize the code repository for agent-friendly operati
content: Empower top engineers to optimize the code repository for agent-friendly operations.

payload.content: Remove resistant executives and engineers from the organization to facilitate change.

name: Remove resistant executives and engineers from the organization to facilitate ch
content: Remove resistant executives and engineers from the organization to facilitate change.

payload.content: A simple heuristic for identifying companies that are failing to adapt to the current technological landscape is their inability to complete tasks (e.g., fix bugs, launch landing pages, upgrade models, get PMs on customer calls, access new AI tools, turn around executive comp negotiations) within a single day.

name: A simple heuristic for identifying companies that are failing to adapt to the cu
content: A simple heuristic for identifying companies that are failing to adapt to the current technological landscape is their inability to complete tasks (e.g., fix bugs, launch landing pages, upgrade models, get PMs on customer calls, access new AI tools, turn around executive comp negotiations) within a single day.

payload.content: Pursue aggressive M&A strategies, identifying and acquiring valuable entities early, as internal development may not be feasible.

name: Pursue aggressive M&A strategies, identifying and acquiring valuable entities ea
content: Pursue aggressive M&A strategies, identifying and acquiring valuable entities early, as internal development may not be feasible.

payload.content: Attempt to rebuild your product from scratch; if it takes less than two weeks, critically evaluate your company's current state.

name: Attempt to rebuild your product from scratch; if it takes less than two weeks, c
content: Attempt to rebuild your product from scratch; if it takes less than two weeks, critically evaluate your company's current state.

payload.content: Exercise caution and selectivity when hiring executives.

name: Exercise caution and selectivity when hiring executives.
content: Exercise caution and selectivity when hiring executives.

payload.content: Implement a same-day Service Level Agreement (SLA) for tasks like bug fixes, polish, and copy that can be effectively handled by AI.

name: Implement a same-day Service Level Agreement (SLA) for tasks like bug fixes, pol
content: Implement a same-day Service Level Agreement (SLA) for tasks like bug fixes, polish, and copy that can be effectively handled by AI.

payload.content: Cultivate a beginner's mindset and learn from any available source, especially for CEOs and executives.

name: Cultivate a beginner's mindset and learn from any available source, especially f
content: Cultivate a beginner's mindset and learn from any available source, especially for CEOs and executives.

payload.content: Organizations must recognize that the competitive landscape has fundamentally shifted, and they risk being left behind if they do not adapt.

name: Organizations must recognize that the competitive landscape has fundamentally sh
content: Organizations must recognize that the competitive landscape has fundamentally shifted, and they risk being left behind if they do not adapt.
